ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقَتْ لَهُم مِّنَّا ٱلْحُسْنَىٰٓ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ عَنْهَا مُبْعَدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those for whom the Best from Us was pre-ordained, will be far away from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But those for whom a good reward had been fore-ordained by Us, will be far removed from it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But for those whom We had decided to favour with good reward, they shall be kept far removed from Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: But those to whom We have already promised blessings will be far away from hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed those to whom Our promise of goodness has been made, have been kept far away from hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, those for whom the good has preceded from Us, they will be removed far therefrom (Hell).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely (as for) those for whom the good has already gone forth from Us, they shall be kept far off from it;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But as for those unto whom already the reward most fair has gone forth from Us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! those unto whom kindness hath gone forth before from Us, they will be far removed from thence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But those who have been promised a good reward by Us will be kept far away from Hell --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily those for whom the good reward hath preceded from Us, they therefrom shall be kept far away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed those to whom there has gone beforehand [the promise of] the best reward from Us will be kept away from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those for whom the good (record) from Us has gone before, will be removed far therefrom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily those for whom the good has preceded from Us, they will be removed far therefrom (Hell) [e.g. 'Iesa (Jesus), son of Maryam (Mary); 'Uzair (Ezra), etc.].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But those whom We have surpassed with the finest (rank) from Us shall be far removed from it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: As for those who deserved goodness from Us—these will be kept away from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, those for whom the best [reward] has preceded from Us - they are from it far removed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:101] Indeed those to whom [the promise of] the best reward, the [best] status, went beforehand from Us, and among such are those who have just been mentioned: they will be kept away from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! those unto whom kindness hath gone forth before) those to whom Paradise has been enjoined; the reference here is to Ezra and Jesus (from Us, they will be far removed from thence) they will be saved from the Fire.
